title: Payment.Cancel.Input
description: Request to cancel an AP2 or provider-backed payment.

transactionId.description: The AP2 or provider transaction identifier to cancel.

provider.description: Optional payment provider (AP2, Stripe, PayPal, etc.).

reason.description: Human-readable reason for cancellation (duplicate, fraud concern, vendor error, etc.).

requestedBy.description: Actor requesting cancellation (user, agent, automated rule).

evidence.description: Optional evidence supporting cancellation (screenshots, vendor messages, logs).

metadata.description: Arbitrary metadata for routing, correlation, or provider-specific fields.
